content: आपॄ {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> or {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To fill; <ls>R. 16. 65</ls>; <ls>Bg. 11. 30</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 118</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab>) to make full, complete, to fulfil (wishes); भृत्यैरापूर्यते नृपः <ls>H. 2. 74.</ls> {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} To be filled, to be filled with wind, be blown (as a conch); आपूर्यमाणानां स्नानशंखानां <ls>K. 16.</ls>
